title: For the colony in Virginea Britannia. Lavves diuine, morall and martiall, &c.
author: Virginia.
notes: Variant 1: with an added dedication leaf to (a) Sir A. Auger, (b) Sir E. Sandys, or (c) Sir W. Wade. Variant 2: with an added leaf of verses to Lord de la Warre and Sir Thomas Smith.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
